Keywords: Apokolips , Celebrity , Cosmic , Deity , Ruler
Real Name: Uxas
Special Powers
TARGETING: Elevated, Characters
CHILDREN SHOULD NOT MEDDLE IN THE AFFAIRS OF ADULTS: KNOCKBACK. // When a friendly character knocks back one or more opposing characters, if at least one character they knocked back hasn't been knocked back this turn, gain 1 MISSION POINT. // If Darkseid is 250 points, when he knocks back one or more opposing characters, gain 2 MISSION POINTS.
HOW DARE YOU ENTER MY HOME: Phasing/Teleport. When Darkseid uses it, after resolutions he may make an attack.
HA HA, DIABOLICAL!: STOP. Invincible, Super Senses.
IF ONLY I WAS HALF AS EVIL: Outwit, Perplex, Ranged Combat Expert.
